paswaru 1.00 dharma deshanawa shasthrawedi panditha pallegama hemarathana nahimi, 2.00 dharma deshanawata adala prashna sakachcha kirima, 2.45 damsabha mandapaya ralapanawe dhammajothi nahimi (lankaramadhikari) 3.45 bhawanawa panditha ipalawa pemananda himi, 04.45 bodhi pujawa panditha kehelwala rewatha himi, 5.45 sil pawaranaya.perawaru 6.15 – 7.15 sil samadan wima, theruwan wandanawa ha buddha pujawa panapitiye wijitha nanda himi, 7.30 – 9.45 bhawanawa ha dharma deshanawa, malsiripura dhammakusala himi, 10.00– 11.30 dharma deshanawa – puliyadde sudhamma himi paswaru 1.00 – 2.45 dharma sakachchawa – shantha disanayaka mahatha, 3.00 – 4.00 dharma deshanaya– palathota panynyananda himi, 4.15 – 6.00 dharma deshanaya – uurugaha sudewa himi, 6.05 – 7.00 panadure ariyadhamma himiyange bodhipujawa (patigatha kala ekaki) 7.15– 8.50 dharmacharya ke.

karadiya parisara paddhathiya pahatha kotas walata bediya haka.sagarika (mahadwipika thatiya wasa sitina sagaraye nogambauru kotasa) ; gambauru (pathula ho gambauruma jalaya ), nithala (pathulema wu upastharaya) , anthar-udam (wadadiya ha badiya athara pihitana pradeshaya) wu punila moya , lawana waguru bima,koral para saha jalathapi wiwara (rasayanikawa sanslopitha salfar baktiriya magin aahara mulya sapayayi.)
